gabriel davison

2022-05-19 Nulukuk Logo

View Live / View Source

An animated logo I worked on for @nukuluk_nukuluk. This was projected during a live show.

The model was rendered using three.js and the processed with hydra. I set up a few different processing chains and then toggled them at diffrent intervals, sometimes changing the speed of the interval itself. The chains are mostly modulation or feedback effects. If you click 'View Live" above you will be taken to an instance of the code I used to generate the video where you can see the effects applied in real time.


Thu, 19 May 2022 00:00:00 GMT
- - - - - - - - - -

PVA - Untethered



At the end of April I got to work with PVA on the video for their song 'Untethered'. I did the projections that were used as a backdrop for the video. These were made using p5.js and then processed with hydra. I had a midi controller hooked up so that I could make changes as they played and sync the visuals up to the song. You can see the code I used here. You'll have to make some changes to get it running though as it's expeciting to be hooked up to a midi controller and will throw an error if it's not plugged in.


Fri, 27 May 2022 00:00:00 GMT
